metadata.description: Every skilled tradesperson has an apprenticeship story. Whether an apprentice, employer or teacher, everyone has an inspirational story to share about their apprenticeship journey.

markdown:
Skip to main content 

![](/sites/default/files/2024-03/Miho%20Cropped.jpg)

Sep 17, 2025

Miho Hind: Preparing For Technical Training 

In 2024, we shared the inspirational story of Miho Hind – a newcomer and new mom who found a supportive community in her new career as a plumbing apprentice. We connected with her on the eve of her starting level 3 technical training to see how she is doing.

[ Learn more](/miho-hind-preparing-technical-training)

Results 19 - 27 of 48

![](/sites/default/files/styles/square_mobile_1x/public/2024-03/Untitled%20design%20%282%29.png.webp?itok=AmI1QSkY)

Mar 27, 2024

#####  [Q&A With Red Seal Motorcycle Technician Amanda Koehler](/qa-red-seal-motorcycle-technician-amanda-koehler)

Amanda is a Red Seal Motorcycle Technician with 20 years of experience. Amanda wants everyone to feel comfortable to pursue their dreams, emphasizing the importance of growing inclusivity in the trades. 

![metal fabricator](/sites/default/files/styles/square_mobile_1x/public/2024-02/Monique-Song-1-web.jpg.webp?itok=VXVmcAnR)

Mar 13, 2024

#####  [Q&A with Metal Fabricator Apprentice Monique Song](/qa-metal-fabricator-apprentice-monique-song)

Monique Song is a Metal Fabricator apprentice who discovered the trades through the Trades Discovery for Women program at BCIT.

![amandeep](/sites/default/files/styles/square_mobile_1x/public/2024-02/Amandeep-Beesla-1-web.jpg.webp?itok=fd3Ihrwf)

Mar 11, 2024

#####  [Q&A With Heavy Equipment Operator Amandeep Beesla](/qa-heavy-equipment-operator-amandeep-beesla)

Amandeep Beesla is certified as a Heavy Equipment Operator with over 20 years of experience in the skilled trades. Amandeep is proud to be part of the building industry in BC and to represent the South Asian community.

![welder on roof](/sites/default/files/styles/square_mobile_1x/public/2024-02/Amy%20Welding%20on%20roof%20-%20cropped.jpg.webp?itok=psTQMa0r)

Mar 07, 2024

#####  [Q&A with Sheet Metal Worker Amy Carr](/qa-sheet-metal-worker-amy-carr)

Amy Carr is a Sheet Metal Worker by trade and has been working in the industry for 13 years.

![Jenny](/sites/default/files/styles/square_mobile_1x/public/2024-02/Jenny.jpeg.webp?itok=oYSbg16I)

Mar 06, 2024

#####  [Success Story: Jenny Coleman](/success-story-jenny-coleman)

Jenny Coleman is a Red Seal certified Painter and Decorator, with 14 years of experience in the trade. Jenny is now an instructor at the Finishing Trades Institute in Surrey, BC.

![Chaylene at work](/sites/default/files/styles/square_mobile_1x/public/2024-02/Chaylene-Deboer-1-web.jpg.webp?itok=cp5tPdm8)

Mar 04, 2024

#####  [Success Story: Chaylene Deboer](/success-story-chaylene-deboer)

Chaylene Deboer is a certified Red Seal electrician with 8+ years of experience. Chaylene encourages girls and women considering joining the trades to just do it! 

![](/sites/default/files/styles/square_mobile_1x/public/2024-01/Victoria%20still.png.webp?itok=Oq55R6yW)

Jan 11, 2024

#####  [Victoria - A Parent's Story](/victoria-parents-story)

We interviewed Victoria, a parent to a Youth in Trades Program participant. She reflects on her family's journey to learn, understand, and start the apprenticeship journey and what her son's future might look like. 

![](/sites/default/files/styles/square_mobile_1x/public/2023-11/Temprite-GroupWithTrucksApril2023_021_0.JPG.webp?itok=oQrCS8RM)

Nov 22, 2023

#####  [Apprenticeship Recognition Month: Temprite Climate Solutions ](/apprenticeship-recognition-month-temprite-climate-solutions)

For Apprenticeship Recognition Month, we called upon the skilled trades community to highlight employers and training providers who go above and beyond for B.C.'s apprentices! 

![](/sites/default/files/styles/square_mobile_1x/public/2023-11/Hiep%20Ngyen%20Blackline_0.JPG.webp?itok=InaBdpgo)

Nov 15, 2023

#####  [Apprenticeship Recognition Month: Quadrant Marine Institute ](/apprenticeship-recognition-month-quadrant-marine-institute)

For Apprenticeship Recognition Month, we called upon the skilled trades community to highlight employers and training providers who go above and beyond for B.C.'s apprentices!
